name: X2: The Threat
notes: The GOG installer may throw errors at the end of the installation which can be ignored.

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

task.app: amstream devenum qasf quartz l3codecx wmp9
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
- aminst: http://files.playonlinux.com/Amov4ie.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/X2 - The Threat/X2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: aminst
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: amstream devenum qasf quartz l3codecx wmp9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing video and audio components
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
